name: Ballz of ninja cats - shooter games
name_original: Ballz of ninja cats - shooter games
description:
Have you ever played brick breaker with 1 or 2 balls in total? How about 100 balls at the same time?

Hold tight and drag to find the best trail, you're able to break bricks with your powerful bombs. Be ware that the bricks will fall down continuously, so you have to break them effectively and efficiently.

Let's clear all the bricks and create new records!
